title: A typical report
text:
Has visual elements

import plotly.express as px
df = px.data.tips()
fig = px.histogram(df, x="total_bill")
fig.show()

title: A typical report
section: Can easily define diagrams, e.g. interaction diagrams
text:
Can easily define diagrams, e.g. interaction diagrams

sequenceDiagram
    Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? 
    John-->>Alice: Great!
    Alice-)John: See you later!

title: A typical report
section: Can be adapted to be a slideshow
text:
Can be adapted to be a slideshow

The RISE package converts notebooks into reveal.js slideshows
How a cell acts in the slideshow is set via its Slide Type:

slide: this cell is the beginning of a new slide
subslide: add more content to previous slide
skip: exclude from slideshow


For more see https://rise.readthedocs.io/en/stable/usage.html
